title: C++ Level 10 â€” STL & Problem Solving
concept: Use vectors, sets, and maps from STL to solve basic problems.

challenges.title: Distinct Elements using Set
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, print how many distinct values there are (using a set).
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of distinct elements.

challenges.title: Frequency of Numbers using Map
challenges.description: Given N and N integers, print the frequency of each distinct number in increasing order of the number. Each line should be: number count.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Multiple lines, each containing: number count.
